Package com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Interface MailConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.Configuration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MailConfigurationImpl
    public interface MailConfiguration
extends com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.Configuration
    Interface defining parameters to configure email sending.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getAWSMailAccessKey()
      Amazon AWS access key to use if Amazon SES is used as a provider.
      long getAWSMailCheckQuotaAfterMillis()
      Milliseconds to wait before checking sending quota to avoid Amazon SES throttling.
      AWSEmailSenderCredentials getAWSMailCredentials()
      Returns structure containing AWS credentials to use Amazon SES.
      java.lang.String getAWSMailSecretKey()
      Amazon AWS secret key to use if Amazon SES is used as a provider.
      java.lang.String getMailFromAddress()
      Email address to send emails from.
      java.lang.String getMailHost()
      SMTP server host to connect to send emails.
      java.lang.String getMailId()
      User id to log into SMTP server to send emails.
      java.lang.String getMailPassword()
      User password to log into SMTP server to send emails.
      int getMailPort()
      SMTP server port to connect to send emails.
      EmailProvider getProvider()
      Email provider to use to send emails.
      boolean isMailSendingEnabled()
      Indicates if email sending is enabled or not.

      • getMailId

        java.lang.String getMailId()
        User id to log into SMTP server to send emails. This value is optional and can be left as null if server does not require credentials.
        Returns:
        user id to log into SMTP server to send emails.

      • getMailPassword

        java.lang.String getMailPassword()

        Returns:

      • isMailSendingEnabled

        boolean isMailSendingEnabled()
        Indicates if email sending is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        true if email sending is enabled, false otherwise.
